duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and data analysis.
Provide expertise in science topics for Elementary, Middle, and High School Science, and knowledge of state and national science standards.
Communicate with various roles via chat, email, phone, posted reports, videoconference meetings, and in-person/virtual interactions.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and train Science and potentially Math items to a scorer population.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science or Physical Sciences (Master's preferred)
